original_text: God teaches us more things than he teaches to the animals. He makes us wiser than the birds.” God teaches us more things than he teaches to the animals. He makes us wiser than the birds.” God teaches us more things than he teaches to the animals.
korean_text: 땅의 짐승들보다도 우리를 더욱 가르치시고 하늘의 새들보다도 우리를 더욱 지혜롭게 하시는 이가 어디 계시냐고 말하는 이도 없구나

sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 우리에게 더 많은 것들을 가르치신다

sentences.original_text: than he teaches to the animals
